hero.title: I'm Luke, an analytical thinker in the Netherlands
hero.tagline: Finance professional turned curious learner, documenting my journey through data, experiments, and the occasional Dutch language mishap.

paragraphs: I'm a finance professional living in the Netherlands, where I've spent the last six years trying to master Dutch (spoiler: still working on it). What started as a career in Accounting and then FP&A has evolved into a fascinating journey of analytical thinking and continuous learning.
My approach to problems is deeply rooted in my CliftonStrengths - Harmony, Context, and Analytical thinking. I believe in understanding the "why" behind everything.

facts.text: 6 years in Netherlands, Dutch still a work in progress
